data.name: CALIBRATION_REQUIRES_MANUAL_INTERACTION
data.value: 校正只能在手動操作下完成，例如：可能需要使用滑鼠。若您無法手動操作您的電腦，您可能會卡在校正程序。 您確定要重新校正嗎？

data.name: COLLAPSED_DOCK_THICKNESS
data.value: Collapsed dock thickness (as % of full dock thickness):

data.name: CORRUPTED_SETTINGS_MESSAGE
data.value:
Optikey has detected that your user settings file has become corrupted and must be repaired. This will be done by restoring an old version, or a default version if that isn't possible.
Click Yes to reset your user settings and restart.
Click No to close so that you can manually repair or copy your user settings file.

data.name: CORRUPTED_SETTINGS_TITLE
data.value: 噢不！使用者設定檔已經損毀了。

data.name: CRASH_MESSAGE
data.value:
壞消息：Optikey 的腳去扭到並已關閉。
您可以寫一封電子郵件詳述發生的經過，這會對我們非常有幫助：crash@optikey.org
造成不便敬請見諒。

data.name: USE_COMMUNIKATE_KEYBOARD_LAYOUT
data.value: 使用 CommuniKate 鍵盤配置

data.name: PRESAGE_CONSTRUCTOR_EXCEPTION_MESSAGE
data.value:
Optikey 無法和 Presage 互動。可能的原因如下： 1. 找不到 presage.xml（位於C:\Users\USER_NAME\.presage）中指定的 DBFILENAME，請檢查並修正它（或解除安裝、重新安裝 Presage）。 2. 您可能安裝了 64 位元的 Presage（Optikey 只支援 32 位元版），或 Presage 檔被移動、刪除、損毀。
請移除 Presage 並安裝 32 位元的 0.9.2 版。 Optikey 會嘗試繼續執行，但可能很快就會當掉。 預測方式將切換為 NGram 以防下次執行時當掉。

data.name: PRESAGE_CONSTRUCTOR_EXCEPTION_TITLE
data.value: 使用 Presage 時遇到了問題

data.name: DISCARD_CHANGED_SETTINGS
data.value: All changes made to the settings will be discarded, do you want to continue?

data.name: DICTIONARY_IS_PRESAGE
data.value: 無法在此編輯 Presage 的字典。 它的預設位置在「C:\Program Files (x86)\presage\share\presage\database_en.db」。 可用能讀取 SQLite3 檔案的程式編輯它，例如免費軟體《DB Browser for SQLite》

data.name: IRISBOND_CALIBRATION_COMPLETE
data.value: 校正完成（成功或失敗），總之一切都恢復運作了！

data.name: DYNAMIC_KEYBOARD_DEFINITION_INVALID
data.value: 無效的動態鍵盤定義檔

data.name: DYNAMIC_KEYBOARD_HEIGHT_ABOVE_THRESHOLD
data.value: 定義的動態鍵盤太高（大於畫面的 95%）

data.name: DEFAULT_UILANGUAGE_TO_URDU
data.value: We recommend changing the UiLanguage to Urdu to ensure typed Urdu text flows from right to left in the scratchpad. Would you like Optikey to automatically set the UiLanguage to Urdu?

data.name: FONTFAMILY_IS_NOT_COMPATIBLE_WITH_URDU_LANGUAGE
data.value: We recommend changing the font used in Optikey to one which is fully compatible with Urdu. If a font is used which is not Urdu specific then text, and especially numbers, may display incorrectly. Would you like Optikey to automatically set the font to Nafees Web Naskh?

data.name: LANGUAGE_SPECIFIC_FONT_RECOMMENDED
data.value: A language specific font is recommended

data.name: UILANGUAGE_AND_KEYBOARDANDDICTIONARYLANGUAGE_DIFFER_TITLE
data.value: 使用者介面和鍵盤／字典的語言不同

data.name: TYPE_DIACRITICS_AFTER_LETTERS
data.value: 在文字後方輸入特殊符號（變音等…）：

data.name: DEFAULT_UILANGUAGE_TO_PERSIAN
data.value: We recommend changing the UiLanguage to Persian to ensure typed Persian text flows from right to left in the scratchpad. Would you like Optikey to automatically set the UiLanguage to Persian?

data.name: FONTFAMILY_IS_NOT_COMPATIBLE_WITH_PERSIAN_LANGUAGE
data.value: We recommend changing the font used in optiKey to one which is fully compatible with Persian. If a font is used which is not Persian specific then text, and especially numbers, may display incorrectly. Would you like Optikey to automatically set the font to Nazli?

data.name: ERROR_HANDLING_INPUT_SERVICE_SELECTION_RESULT
data.value: 處理按鍵選擇時發生了錯誤。

data.name: LOAD_DICTIONARY_DESCRIPTION
data.value: 載入字典以檢視、新增或刪除單字。

data.name: OPTIKEY_MOUSE_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Optikey Mouse : 完整控制遊標

data.name: OPTIKEY_SYMBOL_DESCRIPTION
data.value: Optikey Symbol : 使用圖片溝通

data.name: ALIENWARE_17_INFO
data.value: 這需要 Alienware 17 遊戲筆電，使用內建的 Tobii 眼動儀。

data.name: GAZE_TRACKER_INFO
data.value: This requires the ITU Gaze Tracking Library, which is a framework for open source eye tracking using off-the-shelf components, such as webcams and videocameras.

data.name: IRISBOND_DUO_INFO
data.value: 如果您打算搭配 Irisbond Duo 眼動儀使用 Optikey，請確認您已安裝 Irisbond Duo 驅動程式。它可以從 https://www.irisbond.com/products/downloads 下載。

data.name: MOUSE_POSITION_INFO
data.value: In this mode, Optikey will use the mouse cursor as input instead of talking directly to an eye tracker. You might want this if you're testing Optikey out, or if you want to use it with an alternative input device such as a head mouse or any eye tracker not in this list.

data.name: TOBII_ASSISTIVE_INFO
data.value: To use Optikey with an assistive eye tracker, you either need the new version of Windows Control, or the Tobii Eye Tracking engine. If you need to use the old version of the Tobii Windows control application (including Tobii Gaze Interaction settings), then you will need to control Optikey using mouse position instead.

data.name: TOBII_EYEX_INFO
data.value: 此選項適用與任何 Tobii 遊戲眼動儀（5, 4C, EyeX, Alienware, Steelseries等）

data.name: VI_MYGAZE_INFO
data.value: The Visual Interaction myGaze is only supported if you've already installed the myGaze client drivers, which are no longer available for download. If you don't have these drivers installed, you should select use 'mouse position' instead, and use Optikey in combination with the myGaze EyeMousePlay application to move the cursor.

data.name: ALLOW_MULTIPLE_INSTANCES
data.value: 允許同時執行多個 Optikey 程式：

data.name: ERROR_DURING_TRANSLATION
data.value: 翻譯文字時發生了錯誤

data.name: ENABLE_OVERRIDE_TRANSLATION_API_KEY_LABEL
data.value: 使用其他的 Yandex 翻譯 API 金鑰？

data.name: ENABLE_TRANSLATION_KEY_LABEL
data.value: 啟用「翻譯」按鍵：（自動複製譯文）
